biotools.summary: Contains 500 antigens to pathogenic species curated from the literature and other immunological resources. In it, a database entry contains information regarding the sequence, structure, origin, etc. of an antigen with additional information such as B and T-cell epitopes, MHC binding, function, gene-expression and post translational modifications, where available. It also provides links to major internal and external databases.
